item.title: 7 Major Side Effects of Eating Too Many Raisins
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Raisins are the dried grapes that are eaten as raw and are also used for cooking, baking and brewing purposes. They are grown in many regions of the world such as the United Kingdom, Ireland, New Zealand and Australia. Raisins are an excellent source of many nutrients like vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, phytonutrients, and polyphenols, etc.… Read More »7 Major Side Effects of Eating Too Many Raisins

They are eaten raw, and also used for cooking, baking, and brewing purposes. item.description: Pistachio is a delicious and healthy nut of the pistachios tree and is a member of the cashew family. They are native to Asia but are now produced and consumed in many parts of the world. Pistachios provide many health and beauty benefits as they are rich in essential nutrients. item.title: 8 Major Side Effects Of Eating Too Many Peanuts (Moongphali)
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Peanuts or groundnuts are a legume crop that grows in the tropical and subtropical regions of the world. They are known as nuts but botanically speaking they are legumes as they grow underground and not like the walnuts and almonds that grow on the trees.
